name: Target Jumper
description:
This did not appear in The Rainbow buy in the premier issue (August 1993) of The World of  68' Micros. It's a knock off of an old Atari 2600 game.

You need to land the paratrooper on the target. Press the space bar to jump from the plane. Press the up arrow to open the parachute, then steer with the left and right arrows. Mind the wind. The later you open the chute, the more points you get. If you fail to open the chute you lose points.
